translate.english: on the vehicle / on the car

examples.example: 我在拥挤的车上给老人让了座，收获了一个真诚的笑容。

translate.english: I gave my seat to the old man on the crowded bus and received a sincere smile.

examples.example: 我每天都会在上班的车上听一些轻松的音乐来缓解压力。

translate.english: I will listen to some relaxing music on the vehicle to work every day to relieve stress.

examples.example: 我喜欢在安静的车上阅读喜欢的书籍，那感觉十分惬意。

translate.english: I like reading my favorite books in the quiet car, and that feeling is very comfortable.
